targets.expr:
avg(irate(redis_commands_duration_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace",app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster",pod=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, pod, cmd)
  /
avg(irate(redis_commands_total{namespace=~"$namespace",app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster",pod=~"$instance",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, pod, cmd)
